name: Alive (itch) (Amy Parent)
description:
"You wake up in a strange room. It's 12AM on the 1st of January 1970. The room is dark and quiet. You're laying on the carpeted floor. Should you stand up?'

Alive is a text adventure that explores loneliness. Type "help" for hints!

  • Game Design & Story by Emma Rydström (@EmmaRGames)
  • Code & Story contributions by Amy Parent (@amyinorbit)
